title: Stress - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/6/20
itunes:title: Stress - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/6/20
description:
George Noory and psychotherapist Dr. Laurie Nadel explore her work with stress, how people can deal with the constant acute stress of the coronavirus pandemic, and how the event is similar to PTSD in soldiers in combat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and psychotherapist Dr. Laurie Nadel explore her work with stress, how people can deal with the constant acute stress of the coronavirus pandemic, and how the event is similar to PTSD in soldiers in combat.

itunes:summary: A discussion on how stress can impact your well being and how to handle it better.
